name: NSPersistentStoreRequestType
desc: Constants that specify the types of fetch requests.

items.name: case fetchRequestType
items.desc: Specifies that the request returns managed objects.

items.name: case saveRequestType
items.desc: Specifies that the request saves managed objects.

items.name: case batchInsertRequestType
items.desc: A request that inserts data into a persistent store using a batch of managed objects or dictionaries.

items.name: case batchUpdateRequestType
items.desc: A request that updates data for multiple managed objects in a persistent store.

items.name: case batchDeleteRequestType
items.desc: A request that deletes data for multiple managed objects from a persistent store.
